summary: CONSUMER STATES AT 13000 MILES, THE STEERING WHEEL BEGAN TO "SHIMMY" WHEN DRIVING. THE CONSUMER TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER WHO  TURNED THE ROTORS.  AT 23000, THE SHIMMYING BEGAN AGAIN AS WELL AS GRINDING  NOISE WHEN APPLYING THE BRAKES. THE DEALER TURNED THE ROTORS AND REPLACED THE PADS.  AT 36000 MILES THE BRAKES BEGAN PULSATING WHEN DRIVING.  THE DEALER STATED THE ROTORS WERE WARPED. *JB
